# material-ui-calculator

```javascript
import Calculator from '@pie-framework/material-ui-calculator';
const Demo = () => (
  <Calculator mode="basic" onEvaluateExpression={(expression, result) => {}} />
);
```

[Demo](https://pie-framework.github.io/material-ui-calculator/)
